hero.title: With our AI-powered assistant, you can generate recipes easily
hero.subtitle: No longer have to worry about what to eat for dinner with our random recipe generator!

features.subtitle: Brand New AI Recipe Generator
features.title: Free Online AI Recipes Generator
features.description: Simply select or enter the ingredients, and our AI will craft random,creative and easy-to-follow recipes for you. No more "What's for dinner?" stress.

recipes.title: Get Inspired
recipes.subtitle: Get inspired by our collection of delicious recipes from around the world.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Powerful Recipe Features
services.description: From ingredient recognition to recipe generation, we provide everything you need to create amazing meals.
services.aiGenerationDesc: Transform your available ingredients into delicious recipes using advanced AI technology.
services.smartIngredientDesc: Intelligent ingredient suggestions and categorization to help you find the perfect combinations.
services.multipleCuisineDesc: Generate recipes from various cuisines including Chinese, Italian, Mexican, and more.
services.recipeImageDesc: AI-powered food photography to visualize your recipes before cooking.
services.dietaryFilterDesc: Customize recipes based on vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary needs.
services.recipeSavingDesc: Save your favorite recipes and access your generation history anytime.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, our AI Recipe Generator is completely free to use, but with a weekly limit. You get 7 free uses per week. Once you've used them up, another 7 free uses will be available the following week.
faq.q2: How reliable are the AI-generated recipes?
faq.a2: Our AI is trained on a vast global database of trusted recipes, mastering flavor combinations and cooking techniques to deliver consistently delicious results. That said, cooking is an art—so don't hesitate to get creative and make each recipe your own!
faq.a3: Your privacy is our priority. We DO NOT store any recipe data you generate. To preserve your creations, please save any recipes you want to keep to your local device.
faq.q4: How can I provide feedback or report issues?
faq.a4: We'd love to hear from you! Please share your feedback or report any problems by contacting our support team at annnb016@gmail.com. Your input helps us continuously improve our service.
faq.q5: How long does the transformation process take?
faq.a5: Most recipes are generated in 20-60 seconds. The exact time depends on the AI model selected and current server load. During peak hours, you may experience slightly longer wait times due to high demand.
faq.q6: Can I use the generated images commercially?
faq.a6: Yes. The generated images are free for both personal and commercial use, but please ensure not to infringe on other brands' copyright.

footer.description: RecipeEasy is an AI-powered platform that transforms your ingredients into delicious recipes. Experience the magic of culinary creativity in seconds.
